'''Sugar''' is a [[food]] ingredient and [[brewing]] ingredient made from [[sugar cane]] or [[honey bottle]]s.

=== Horses ===
Sugar can be fed to [[horse]]s to heal {{hp|1}}, speed growth by 30 seconds, and increase taming probability by 3%.

==Trivia==
According to [[Minecraft Education|Education Edition]], the chemical formula of Minecraft sugar is C<sub>6</sub>H<sub>12</sub>O<sub>6</sub>; while this could make it [[w:C6H12O6|any number of simple sugars]], it confirms it is not actually [[W:sucrose|sucrose]] (common table sugar).
